page.title: 12RECREATION IN HOUNSLOW (2)
page.content: Snooker, voluntary walking, Basketball, travelling, bowling at alleys and athletics were of limited popularity, with only two participants for each activity. Three people enjoyed each of Motoring, Cricket, listening to music, sewing, sculpturing and arts, photography and skating. Golf had five participants and six people enjoyed reading. D.I.Y. was quite a popular pastime with seven people in the survey interested in it. There were nine participants for each of swimming and football. {Walking}was the second most popular pastime with ten people participating in it. By far the most popular pastime was {gardening}which involved people of all ages.
